description: Marine Headquarters, a massive military fortress shaped like a crescent moon. The site of the Summit War and Ace's tragic death.

keyEvents.title: Ace's Death at Marineford
keyEvents.description: Portgas D. Ace dies on the battlefield at Marineford after being fatally wounded by Admiral Akainu.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most significant deaths in One Piece history occurs at this location, forever marking Marineford as the site of immense tragedy.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Breakdown at Marineford
keyEvents.description: Luffy experiences his most traumatic moment as he watches his brother die in his arms on the Marineford battlefield.
keyEvents.significance: Marineford becomes the site of Luffy's greatest loss and trauma.

statusHistory.reason: Marine Headquarters operational during this episode

description: An archipelago near the Red Line where people gather to watch the broadcast of the Marineford War.

keyEvents.title: Sabaody Witnesses Ace's Death
keyEvents.description: People at Sabaody Archipelago watch the broadcast and react in shock and horror to Ace's death.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the global impact of Ace's death being witnessed by people around the world.
